channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: OFF Air
channel.desc: This channel is off air, or it has temporarily no EPG data yet.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Animals with Cameras
channel.desc: The team uncover the hidden lives of three iconic animals. In the Kalahari Desert they put cameras on wild meerkats, in Cameroon, Gordon and scientist Mimi Swift look at a four-year-old orphan chimp, and in Argentina, penguins carry tiny cameras far out to sea on an epic journey of up to 300 kilometres.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Flog It!
channel.desc: The team is at Penrhyn Castle in north Wales. Antiques expert David Harper finds an unusual Japanese writing table and Adam Partridge discovers a Cornish artwork. Also, Paul Martin uncovers the story of Britain's longest running industrial strike.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Richard Osman's House of Games
channel.desc: Yinka Bokinni, Ellie Leach, Vicki Michelle and Peter Serafinowicz test their general knowledge skills on this week's House of Games.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Strictly Come Dancing: It Takes Two
channel.desc: Janette Manrara has more exciting behind-the-scenes action from the world of Strictly as some of the couples stop by for a chat to reveal more about their upcoming dances. Also, Choreography Corner dissects the rest of the weekend's performances.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Nigella: At My Table
channel.desc: For a lunch with friends, Nigella's herbed leg of lamb is relaxingly simple to prepare, served with garlicky roast potatoes with oregano and feta. Other dishes include chocolate olive oil mousse, and ginger and walnut carrot cake.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Chronicles of the Sperrins
channel.desc: It's autumn and the mountains are a kaleidoscope of colour. Under the waters rare treasures are revealed, up above the dark skies bring celestial wonders.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Digging for Britain
channel.desc: A quarryman makes the chance discovery of a set of very large footprints. Archaeologists strip the Cambridgeshire landscape, uncovering multiple Iron Age settlements. A community dig gives clues as to why the Romans created new towns.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: QI XL
channel.desc: Sandi Toksvig looks at sideshows, stunts and scavenger hunts.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Live at the Apollo
channel.desc: The magnificent Sara Pascoe introduces comedians Amy Gledhill and Eddie Kadi to the stage.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Newsnight
channel.desc: Featuring extensive coverage of the day's top national and international news stories, along with explanations about the context and potential aftereffects.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: BBC Weather
channel.desc: The latest weather forecast.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Rob Brydon's Honky Tonk Road Trip
channel.desc: Rob heads to the beating heart of country music, Nashville. He explores iconic venues like the Ryman Auditorium, goes live on-air at WSM Radio, and meets country stars old and new.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Stacey & Joe
channel.desc: In this episode at Pickle Cottage, it's all about family. Zach gets time with Dad, Stacey cherishes a visit with Grandma Gwen, and Joe enjoys precious moments with his mum in Spain.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Sharon & Ozzy Osbourne: Coming Home
channel.desc: This intimate film follows the final three years of Ozzy Osbourne's life as he and Sharon plan a return home after 25 years in LA and prepare for the ultimate farewell gig.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Secrets of the Brain
channel.desc: Professor Jim Al-Khalili unravels the mystery of how the most complex structure known of in the universe - the human brain - came to exist.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: DIY SOS
channel.desc: The team are in Leicester to help seven-year-old Isla, a bright and determined little girl who dreams of living more independently in her own home. Born with a rare genetic condition, Isla requires a fully bespoke environment.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: This Is BBC TWO
channel.desc: A preview of upcoming programmes from BBC Two.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Bargain Hunt
channel.desc: Natasha Raskin Sharp meets dapper period tailor Zack Pinsent from Brighton. In the beautiful surroundings of Ardingly Antiques Fair in West Sussex, the red and blue teams make their way around the bountiful stalls on the hunt for the challenges.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: The Repair Shop
channel.desc: Sonnaz Nooranvary restores memories from the golden age of cinema, and a cherished bike is brought back to its former glory.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
channel.desc: Former speaker of the House of Commons John Bercow takes the wheel on this road trip with athletics superstar Sally Gunnell. Along for the ride in the Rolls Royce Corniche are experts Izzy Balmer and Raj Bisra as the teams battle around Brighton in search of bargains. Inspired by her father, Sally runs straight for a milking stool, while John makes an emotional elephant purchase inspired by his mum. But when it's time to get down to business, which team will take home the gold medal?

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: BBC News
channel.desc: A comprehensive compilation of the latest and the most important news stories, updates and developments from the UK and different parts of the world.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Politics Live
channel.desc: Jo Coburn invites a panel of guests to share their opinions on the newsmaking stories of the day.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Impossible
channel.desc: Contestants compete across the series, scoring points by answering questions correctly. However, they must avoid the impossible answers, otherwise they will be eliminated from the show until the next day.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Unbeatable
channel.desc: Jason Manford hosts the quiz show where players face a question and pick from a board of six rankable answers. Some answers are good, but only one is unbeatable.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: OFF Air
channel.desc: This channel is off air, or it has temporarily no EPG data yet.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: OFF Air
channel.desc: This channel is off air, or it has temporarily no EPG data yet.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Animals with Cameras
channel.desc: In Namibia, Gordon joins a cheetah conservationist who wants to see if three orphaned cheetahs, which she has raised from a day old, can learn to hunt effectively in the thick vegetation. In Australia, the team put cameras on fur seals to try to see how they hunt their prey and avoid attacks by great white sharks. In South Africa, the team deploy the first ever cameras on wild baboons in an effort to understand why these clever monkeys sometimes raid farmers' crops.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Flog It!
channel.desc: At the Culzean Castle in Ayrshire, experts Raj Bisram and Natasha Raskin Sharp are on hand to find a selection of objects to take to auction. Raj is drawn to a charming toy car from Germany, while Natasha finds a stunning art deco Carlton Ware vase. Paul Martin meets the team of stonemasons at Culzean, including the newest apprentices, to find out how they are preserving the design of the castle's original architect, Robert Adam.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Richard Osman's House of Games
channel.desc: Yinka Bokinni, Ellie Leach, Vicki Michelle and Peter Serafinowicz test their general knowledge skills on this week's House of Games.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Strictly Come Dancing: It Takes Two
channel.desc: Fleur East guides us through all the backstage ballroom action, with more couples revealing exclusives on what they have planned this weekend. Plus a trip to the training rooms for the first time to see how some of the other celebrities are coping with their movie-themed dances.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: The Crash Detectives
channel.desc: A road worker is hit by a modified car during a police pursuit. However, when the driver fails to stop, the race is on to track the car down and bring the offender to justice.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Jules and Greg's Wild Swim
channel.desc: Jules and Greg take on the Uists - bodysurfing the wild North Atlantic, hitching a ride from the crew after their van breaks down and topping it all off with some island-made gin from a local distillery.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Tropic of Cancer with Simon Reeve
channel.desc: Simon Reeve travels from the beautiful Pacific coast of Mexico, where he visits the luxurious holiday resorts of Baja California, before crossing the country's rugged interior. The first stage of his journey ends in the Bahamas where he discovers the hidden menace on the beautiful coral reefs.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Britain's Nuclear Bomb Scandal: Our Story
channel.desc: A look at the story of Britain's post-war atomic weapons programme, its devastating legacy. Revealing the full extent of the British government's nuclear tests in Australia and the South Pacific in the 1950s and 1960s.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: The Celebrity Traitors: Uncloaked
channel.desc: Ed catches up with the murdered and banished players to get the scoop on all the backstabbing and treachery that goes on inside the castle. And he welcomes players from series past to give their reactions and expert analysis on the game.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Newsnight
channel.desc: Featuring extensive coverage of the day's top national and international news stories, along with explanations about the context and potential aftereffects.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: BBC Weather
channel.desc: The latest weather forecast.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Unspun World with John Simpson
channel.desc: John Simpson brings his expertise to bear on the most important stories. In discussion with the BBC's range of experts across the world, he uses their unique local knowledge to go beyond the headlines to get to the unspun truth about the world.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Eva Longoria: Searching for Spain
channel.desc: Eva Longoria visits Andalusia, the birthplace of flamenco and bullfighting; from jam?n ib?rico to tapas, she savours the iconic flavours of the region.
